ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s mine for comparison.  Up to 859AC, no defense skill raises in level 54 yet, so consider me level 53 for AC purposes.
ygData.messageBody:
Here's mine for comparison. Up to 859AC, no defense skill raises in level
54 yet, so consider me level 53 for AC purposes.
http://www.dakor.net/profiles/pview.asp?x=34


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
Level 54 Minstel, Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 11:01 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: AC


please did i even say that? i just said i did not think getting 900AC as a
bard was as easy as you claimed it to be. and i have sacrificed stats quite
a bit for AC. i assume you were responding to me, my message is not part of
this reply and i think egroups was a little screwy yesterday.

Earring 1: Diamondine (AC 2)
Earring 2: Opalline (AC 2)
Face: Sarnak Hide Mask (AC 6, or Guise of the Deceiver for CHA gear AC 4)
Helm: Crown of King Tranix (AC 13, no way i am wearing my imbrued helm as a
wood elf)
Neck: Runed Lava Pendant (AC 5)
Ring 1: Plat Fire Wedding Ring (AC 5)
Ring 2: Plat Fire Wedding Ring (AC 5)
Arms: Imbrued (AC 16)
Bracer 1: Imbrued (AC 9)
Bracer 2: Imbrued (AC 9)
Hand: Singing Steel (AC 14)
Shoulders: Tattered Mantle (AC 12)
Back: Cloak of the Icebear (AC 8, upgrading to Hooded Black Cloak AC 10 as
soon as i find a seller)
Legs: Imbrued (AC 16)
Chest: Imbrued (AC 29)
Feet: Imbrued (AC 16)
Waist: Runed Bolster Belt (AC 5)
Range: Kerran Toy (AC 3)

ok i may be off, but with practically the best AC item a bard can wear in
every slot i have 838 AC, yet everyone else gets this AC with ease. maybe
my character is bugged.

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
